title: Forge Mod开发，加载不了纹理
author: SMARTMOORE
txt_content:
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: +=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: The following texture errors were found.
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: ==================================================
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]:   DOMAIN fmltutor
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: --------------------------------------------------
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]:   domain fmltutor is missing 1 texture
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]:     domain fmltutor is missing a resource manager - it is probably a side-effect of automatic texture processing
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: -------------------------
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]:     The missing resources for domain fmltutor are:
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]:       textures/items/harmmer.png
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: -------------------------
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]:     No other errors exist for domain fmltutor
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: ==================================================
[15:17:40] [Client thread/ERROR] [TEXTURE ERRORS]: +=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
运行后一直都是上面这个错误，可是我已经放好图像文件了（目录\bin\assets\bettermc\textures\items\harmmer.png）

replies.author: ddyy163
replies.txt_content:
把加载这个材质的代码注释掉 看其他材质报不报错 
可能你所有材质的都有这个问题,这种情况下是目录错误的可能性就很大了

replies.author: SMARTMOORE
replies.txt_content:
ddyy163 发表于 2018-1-13 15:26
把加载这个材质的代码注释掉 看其他材质报不报错 
可能你所有材质的都有这个问题,这种情况下是目录错误的可 ...
好吧，傻傻地抄示例代码，没有把素材集改成自己的mod的
